That's a wrap ! Hope you enjoyed the show, more on #Diormag later today. #Dior #PFW
Raf Simons salutes guests at the end of his first RTW collection for Dior #PFW
The last look of the day, a pink and yellow printed satin duchesse and iridescent silk skirt worn with a black silk/cashmere knitted top.
The final series of looks, with printed skirts in organza and metallic colours are now strolling down through the salons.
look n 48, an embroidered black wool & silk oversize "Bar jacket" worn with a black wool & silk skirt
Look n 44, a navy blue wool and black satin duchesse "A line" dress.
A selection of "line A" jackets and dresses in charcoals and navy blues are now entering the main salon.
A yellow & pale pink double face printed draped bustier worn with a black wool short.  #Dior #PFW
Hidden colours in the drapes of this series of dresses, like a liberation of the feminin silhouette.
An explosion of colour in the drapes of the black wool & silk bustier dress now arriving on the catwalk
A play on materials and colours in all of the "A line" silhouettes strolling through the salons now. #Dior #PFW
Some reinterpretations of the "A line" are now entering the salons
Metallics contrast with layers of pastels in these looks
Look n20, a layered black tulle "A line" pleated dress with blue, lime and striped pink and white metallic organza.
The "H line" is represented in the next series of looks striped organza, layering of transparencies, pleats
Look n 14, a real "Bar jacket" dress worn with a grey wool pleated skirt.
Metallic colours are injected throughout the collection today. #Dior #PFW
A pale orange satin duchesse & pale pink metallic organza bustier cut-off ball-gown dress with a black wool short.
Look n 10, a pale yellow satin duchesse and lime metallic organza "A line" bustier cut-off ball-gown. #Dior #PFW
Several cut-off ball-gowns in duchesse satin pale green, pale orange, pale pink
Look n 4, the first in a series of these mini-dresses.
One of the 1st of Raf Simons' creations, a black wool double breasted "Bar" tuxedo suit #Dior #PFW
For his first ready-to-wear collection for #Dior, Raf Simons explores themes of liberation, as did Mr. Dior in his time. #Dior #PFW
